MergeFromHistoryData.Statement: MERGE w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary USING ( SELECT *, COUNT(1) as history_count FROM ( SELECT dept_id, action_kbn, action_master_id, action_no, action_result, action_kbn_detail, target_id FROM w2_TaskScheduleHistory WHERE schedule_date < @schedule_date ORDER BY history_no ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @limit_count ROWS ONLY ) AS TargetHistoryData GROUP BY dept_id, action_kbn, action_master_id, action_no, action_result, action_kbn_detail, target_id ) AS TargetHistoryDataSummary ON ( w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.dept_id = TargetHistoryDataSummary.dept_id AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.action_kbn = TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_kbn AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.action_master_id = TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_master_id AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.action_no = TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_no AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.action_result = TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_result AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.action_kbn_detail = TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_kbn_detail AND w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.target_id = TargetHistoryDataSummary.target_id ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.history_count = w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary.history_count + TargetHistoryDataSummary.history_count WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( dept_id, action_kbn, action_master_id, action_no, action_result, action_kbn_detail, target_id, history_count ) VALUES ( TargetHistoryDataSummary.dept_id, TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_kbn, TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_master_id, TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_no, TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_result, TargetHistoryDataSummary.action_kbn_detail, TargetHistoryDataSummary.target_id, TargetHistoryDataSummary.history_count );
